模块 com.example.BubbleBobble
程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.InteractableWorld

类 InteractableWorld

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.InteractableWorld.InteractableWorld
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class InteractableWorld extends javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
The interactable world where all static and dynamic component are in, it is the core of the game.

      void clearContents()
      Methods that clears every components from the screen. by removing all objects in the arraylist

    • remove

      public void remove​(GameObject obj)
      remove a single object from the screen
      参数:
      obj - any game object

    • markToReset

      public void markToReset()
      set boolean to make sure the world is ready to be reset

    • calculateScore

      public void calculateScore​(String difficulty, int RemainingLives)
      Method to calculate the final score once game is over, or game is win By taking the following parameters into account:
      参数:
      difficulty - the string value of the difficulties
      RemainingLives - the remaining lives once is upgraded or died.

    • CheckNextLevel

      public void CheckNextLevel()
      Methods to check whether the game can be upgraded to the next level by checking the remaining number of enemies.

    • CheckWin

      public void CheckWin()
      Methods checking whether the game is win by judging the number of the enemy

    • CheckGameOver

      public void CheckGameOver()
      Methods checking whether the game is over by judging the lives of the current world

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Before every game start, this method is used to read from the world template in Resources/world. So that proper map can be produced.

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Getter method to get the score of the interactable world
      返回:
      the int value of the current score

      public void setScore​(int score)
      Setter method to set the score of the interactable world
      参数:
      score - the score value in int type

    • isIsNextLevel

      public boolean isIsNextLevel()
      Getter method to get the boolean indicating whether the world is ready for next level
      返回:
      a boolean value, true indicates that world is ready to upgrade to next level, false otherwise

    • isNextLevelProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.SimpleBooleanProperty isNextLevelProperty()
      Getter method to get the boolean property indicating whether the world is ready for next level
      返回:
      a simple boolean property

      getCurrentLevel(), setCurrentLevel(int)

    • setCurrentLevel

      public void setCurrentLevel​(int currentLevel)
      Setter method to set the int value of the current level of the interactable world
      参数:
      currentLevel - int value of the current level

    • getHeroColor

      public String getHeroColor()
      Getter method to get the hero color of the interactable world
      返回:
      the color of the hero in string value in following format:
      1. "yellow"(DEFAULT)
      2. "blue"
      3. "red"
      4. "green"
      5. "orange"
      6. "purple"
      7. "grey"
      8. "pink"

    • setHeroColor

      public void setHeroColor​(String heroColor)
      Setter method to set the color of the hero in string format
      参数:
      heroColor - the string color of hero in following format:
      1. "yellow"(DEFAULT)
      2. "blue"
      3. "red"
      4. "green"
      5. "orange"
      6. "purple"
      7. "grey"
      8. "pink"

    • getBackground

      public String getBackground()
      Getter method to get background theme of the interactable world
      返回:
      the background theme of the world in string value in following format:
      1. "sea"(DEFAULT)
      2. "mountain"
      3. "jungle"

      参数:

      1. "sea"(DEFAULT)
      2. "mountain"
      3. "jungle"

      Getter method to get the boolean value of whether the game is over
      返回:
      a boolean value, true indicates that game is over, false otherwise
